answer:
MITUNA

  • Sexuality Headcanon: Asexual (not that he’d say so aloud)
  • Gender Headcanon: Possibly bigender, otherwise a cis male (he probably hasn’t thought about it too much, sticking with he/him 5ever)
  • A ship I have with said character: Mitula
  • A BROTP I have with said character: Mituna <> Karkat count? (one of my fave rarepairs, in that order too. mituna might not have been leader but I think he can teach karkat a few things from experience, if he can communicate them and karkat learns iron patience) Damara and Mituna as well, being Friends That Help Friends Totally Fuck Shit Up
  • A NOTP I have with said character: Crotuna
  • A random headcanon: (hit me up I have 44 billion) Mituna’s lusus actually named him Sollux. The Empress caught word of Ancestcaptor’s descendant early on enough to essentially cull him and prepare him to be a powerful psionic prophet working for the hierarchy of the Beforan Empire. As such, he had a lot of unrealistic expectations embedded in his psyche (which seriously impacted his behavior up until “The Incident”); it got to the point of teachers not bothering to learn his actual name and just calling him a diminutive of his future position, “Mituna”. Naturally, he forgot he ever had an identity besides it.

    You know. Since Gemini are twins.
  • General Opinion over said character: L00L K1NKY #!! #!!!! (did his duty and is currently So Done With It All)

KANKRI

  • Sexuality Headcanon: Heterosexual (and dead set on Latula at that)
  • Gender Headcanon: Cis guy (and vehement about it to the point of it being kinda sad)
  • A ship I have with said character: Porrim <> Kankri, if only one-sidedly. one of these millenia he’ll realize he needs her. maybe he’ll return the favor some day
  • A BROTP I have with said character: I wouldn’t call it a brotp but I’m positive he and Cronus would both sit in their little club wearing Meninist shirts
  • A NOTP I have with said character: Kantula
  • A random headcanon: Mituna and Kankri were fairly close friends at one point before the former’s “incident”, and Mituna would help guide Kankri through his Visions as a budding Seer of Blood since he had the most approximate empathy given his prophecies of Doom. When Latula and Mituna start dating, Kankri denies they were ever friends and is the main catalyst of destroying his credibility and indirectly forcing him to face “The Incident” alone. He realized this somewhere in the mix of being dead, but takes out his anger over it on Mituna, since OBVIOUSLY he can do no wrong himself.
  • General Opinion over said character: brings up bad memories, overcompensates and is a total asshole i like to hate because of it

LATULA

  • Sexuality Headcanon: Either Ace or Demi
  • Gender Headcanon: (I am really really boring and not experienced enough in this field) Definitely uses she/her (i am not solid on specifications im so sorry)
  • A ship I have with said character: Mitula
  • A BROTP I have with said character: Porrim and Latula, possibly after a spades fling?
  • A NOTP I have with said character: Kantula
  • A random headcanon: Latula seeks out indie Flash games to cope with sudden anxiety at unholy hours of the daytime, memorizing their stories and playing through every multiple-ending. She really likes platformers, but won’t admit to it because it’s not outwardly “hardcore” enough.
  • General Opinion over said character: Achingly relatable, but harder to peg than you’d think

all of them have a lot of potential, but collectively get the short end of the stick in fanon
question: mituna, or kankri, or both 😘 (also latula if u have it in u😘😘😘😘😘😘😘😘😘💕)
